name: ghw-components-ut-test
description: GHW UI Components in React and Tailwind

scripts.clean:install: npm uninstall ghw-components-ut-test && rm -rf node_modules/ dist/ package-lock.json ghw-components-ut-test-*.tgz && npm install
scripts.build:lib: npm run build && npm pack && npm add ghw-components-ut-test-*.tgz
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:install && npm run build:lib
scripts.publish:lib: npm uninstall ghw-components-ut-test && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm publish

author: UT
